title: The Winter BALL
body_text:
EastCoastDodgeball
in 2011 - who would have thought! Help usher in the year's newest attraction when
ECD
presents "WinterBall". Here's a look at the stellar line-up:
________________________________________
______________
Rimshot Contest #15: "Player's Choice"
With everything that happened in 2010 alone, chances are, predicting the winner for the special "Player's Choice" pregame will be entirely too difficult.
THE REWARD: Aside from unlimited bragging rights, the victor will receive full booking power for the night! This means dividing players into teams, selecting game-by-game rules - anything the champion's heart desires!
Championship Chase #4
Within the two-team match-up will be the ultra-exciting individual
Championship Chase
!
THE REWARD: A special mystery prize is up for grabs and will be unveiled at the conclusion of "WinterBall".
*The winner of the "Player's Choice" Rimshot Contest will serve as the inaugural
Chase
Champion.
Excellence Awards 2010
No fancy ceremony this time around; rather just a simple show of respect and gratitude for those dedicated warriors who helped make 2010 as memorable as possible.
"WinterBall" is certainly bound to be one of 2011's most unpredictable outings. Remember, it all goes down
Saturday, February 26
beginning at
3pm
. So come join the family of over five unforgettable years!
body_html:
EastCoastDodgeball in 2011 - who would have thought! Help usher in the year's newest attraction when ECD presents "WinterBall". Here's a look at the stellar line-up:

______________________________________________________


Rimshot Contest #15: "Player's Choice"
With everything that happened in 2010 alone, chances are, predicting the winner for the special "Player's Choice" pregame will be entirely too difficult.
  • THE REWARD: Aside from unlimited bragging rights, the victor will receive full booking power for the night! This means dividing players into teams, selecting game-by-game rules - anything the champion's heart desires!

    Championship Chase #4
    Within the two-team match-up will be the ultra-exciting individual Championship Chase!
  • THE REWARD: A special mystery prize is up for grabs and will be unveiled at the conclusion of "WinterBall".
    *The winner of the "Player's Choice" Rimshot Contest will serve as the inaugural Chase Champion.

    Excellence Awards 2010
    No fancy ceremony this time around; rather just a simple show of respect and gratitude for those dedicated warriors who helped make 2010 as memorable as possible.

    "WinterBall" is certainly bound to be one of 2011's most unpredictable outings. Remember, it all goes down Saturday, February 26 beginning at 3pm. So come join the family of over five unforgettable years!
